headline: Musk Confronts Microsoft CEO Over Alleged Employee Remarks On Charlie Kirk's Assassination
summary: Elon Musk has challenged Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella over comments allegedly made by employees of Microsoft’s gaming division, Activision Blizzard, celebrating the assassination of conservative commentator Charlie Kirk. The contentious posts were supposedly made by developers and employees of Activision Blizzard on social media platform X. Musk, in response to the post, tagged Nadella, seeking an explanation for the incident. “What's going on here, @satyanadella?” the Tesla and SpaceX CEO questi
